courses.name: Introduction to HTML and CSS
courses.description: This course teaches the basics of HTML and CSS, the two languages used in web development.

courses.name: Introduction to JavaScript
courses.description: This course teaches the basics of JavaScript, the programming language used to add interactivity to web pages. You'll learn how to write code that performs simple and useful tasks on a web page. You'll learn how to use JavaScript to add animation, expand functionality, and add sound effects to your web pages.

courses.name: Introduction to ReactJS
courses.description: This course teaches the basics of ReactJS.
